name: Vagos dream
description:
if you want to play it in browser/linux/macOS, go here: https://dulik.net/games/vagos/

Ideal game for Valentine's day! You can play it solo or with your loved one.

2 player coop game with controller support

Jump over mines with charged jump and dodge tank bullets.

Compete with your friend and compare highscores with your mates!
Expect this game on steam soon.
